title: Wizard Esports - LF Scrims | Scrim Partners
body:
**Greetings Summoners and Spell casters!**

Wizard has just confirmed its teams after trialing and sorting through a number of applicants of a variety of skill levels. I am delighted to say that both teams are extremely well put together and I look forward to their future progress as they endeavor to reach the Oceanic Challenger Series. 

If you missed the post about recruitment for Wizard, you can find it at the link below.

[Wizard Esports Recruitment Thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/2KGvAaPA-wizard-esports-new-to-scene-lf-players-and-staff)

**Wizard Esports | LF Scrims | Scrim Partners**

Wizard is now looking for regular scrims and regular scrim partners that are ready to play on a weekly basis.  Our players are ranking tiers between Diamond - Master so preferably teams around these tiers would be highly favored. 

Feel free to add me on League of Legends, IGN: Draco the Aura - to schedule your scrim with Wizard!

Draco
Owner/Founder of Wizard Esports
